alfredsnippet.snippet:
"Knowledge is Property, with its own market value and trading relationships, to be protected by those who trade in that body of knowledge. He who brings new knowledge is a vandal, much as the Nazis who burned the books were vandals. The reason is that the intrusion of new knowledge results in the rejection of the old books. New knowledge has to be defined."

- Ivor Catt
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Knowledge is Property
